1.title: CPH34 HV High Volume Stapled Hemorrhoidopexy

articles.desc:
CPH34 HV High Volume Stapled Hemorrhoidopexy

The Chex™ CPH34HV is the first device specifically designed to maximise the volume of the staple housing whilst maintaining the essential design characteristics of, what has been proven scientifically and in clinical use, to be the most effective device in use today for Stapled haemorrhoidopexy. The Chex™ CPH34HV a remarkable step forward in the treatment of haemorrhoids, ODS and associated Rectal Prolapse.
articles.features: CPH34 HV High Volume Stapled Hemorrhoidopexy
articles.materials:
CPH34 HV High Volume Stapled Hemorrhoidopexy

articles.desc:
Circular Stapler for Rectal Prolapse and Hemorrhoids

               

The introduction of the Chex™ CPH 34 and CPH 32 range of Circular Staplers for Stapeled Hemorrhoidopexy has been received with the highest praise from surgeons around the world.

3.title: Single Use Curved Intraluminal Circular Stapler

articles.desc:
Single Use Curved Intraluminal Circular Stapler

               

The Chex™ CS range of Circular Staplers has been proven in clinical use in markets around the world. The range now includes models for standard open (CS) and advanced Laparoscopic (ENDOSTEER™ CSL) procedures.

Single Use Reloadable Linear Cutter Stapler

               

The Chex™ range of Linear Cutter Staplers focuses on reliability and functionality. Designed to provide accurate and reliable staple formation and resection...time and time again.

5.title: TransCut™ Single Use Transverse Cutting Linear Stapler

articles.desc:
TransCut™ Single Use Transverse Cutting Linear Stapler

               

The Chex™ TCLS range of straight, transverse cutting, linear staplers represents a major step forward in presenting a device that provides sure and safe tissue stapling and cutting in areas where access is restricted. TCLS 40B and 40G represent the first in a family of Transverse Cutting Linear Staplers.

6.title: CS COMPACT™ & CS COMPACT™ EA Circular Staplers

articles.desc:
CS COMPACT™ & CS COMPACT™ EA Circular Staplers

               

The Chex™ CS COMPACT™ range was developed with one of the world's leading Specialist centres in Colon and Rectal Surgery. The resultant range of circular staplers creates devices that make anastomosis of the rectum easier. The CS COMPACT™ is a SHORT-STRAIGHT Circular Stapler 34.5mm long, that in many Low and especially Ultra-Low Anterior resections will feel right for you.
articles.features: CS COMPACT™ & CS COMPACT™ EA Circular Staplers

CS COMPACT™ & CS COMPACT™ EA Circular Staplers

articles.desc:
Single Use Reloadable Linear Stapler

               

The Chex™ Single Use Reloadable Linear Stapler boasts staples that are closer together, overlap more and are made from marginally thicker titanium wire. These factors suggest the Chex™ stapler can produce a more intimate joint between two wound edges.
